name: http://linksys.com/jnap/parentalcontrol/ParentalControl
desc: This service provides access to a router's parental controls settings.

GetParentalControlSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/parentalcontrol/GetParentalControlSettings
GetParentalControlSettings.desc: This action gets the router's parental control settings.

isParentalControlEnabled.desc: Whether parental control features are currently enabled.

rules.desc: The current list of parental control rules.

maxRuleDescriptionLength.desc: The maximum length, in bytes, of a rule's description.

maxRuleMACAddresses.desc: The maximum number of MAC addresses that can be specified by a rule.

maxRuleBlockedURLLength.desc: The maximum length, in bytes, of a blocked URL specified by a rule.

maxRuleBlockedURLs.desc: The maximum number of blocked URLs that a rule can specify.

maxRules.desc: The maximum number of rules that can exist simultaneously.

SetParentalControlSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/parentalcontrol/SetParentalControlSettings
SetParentalControlSettings.desc: This action sets the router's parental control settings.

isParentalControlEnabled.desc: Whether parental control features should be enabled.

rules.desc: The desired list of parental control rules.

errors.ErrorBlockedURLTooLong: One of the blocked URLs of one of the specified rules was longer than the maximum allowed length specified by the maxRuleBlockedURLLengthmember of the GetParentalControlSettings action.
errors.ErrorDescriptionTooLong: The description of one of the specified rules was longer than the maximum allowed length specified by the maxRuleDescriptionLengthmember of the GetParentalControlSettings action.
errors.ErrorInvalidMACAddress: One of the specified rules contains an invalid MAC address.
errors.ErrorInvalidWANSchedule: One of the specified rules contains an invalid WAN schedule.
errors.ErrorRulesOverlap: A MAC address was specified more than once in the list of rules.
errors.ErrorTooManyBlockedURLs: One of the specified rules contains more than the maximum allowed number of blocked URLs specified by the maxRuleBlockedURLsmember of the GetParentalControlSettings action.
errors.ErrorTooManyMACAddresses: One of the specified rules contains more than the maximum allowed number of MAC addresses specified by the maxRuleMACAddressesmember of the GetParentalControlSettings action.
errors.ErrorTooManyRules: The specified list of rules contains more than the maximum allowed number of rules specified by the maxRules member of the GetParentalControlSettings action.

description.desc: A description of the rule. The maximum length of this value is specified by the maxRuleDescriptionLength member of the GetParentalControlSettingsaction.

macAddresses.desc: The MAC addresses that are governed by the rule. A given MAC address can only appear once in the list of parental control rules.

wanSchedule.desc: The schedule specifying when WAN access should be allowed and blocked during each calendar week.

blockedURLs.desc: The list of URLs that should be blocked by the rule.
